original_text: And the skillfully woven band on it was of one piece with it and made like it, of gold, blue and purple and scarlet yarns, and fine twined linen, as the Lord had commanded Moses.
korean_text: 에봇 위에 에봇을 매는 띠를 에봇과 같은 모양으로 금 실과 청색 자색 홍색 실과 가늘게 꼰 베 실로 에봇에 붙여 짰으니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 하였더라

sentences.original_text: And the skillfully woven band on it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것 위에 있는 기술적으로 짠 띠는

sentences.original_text: was of one piece with it
of gold, blue and purple and scarlet yarns
as the Lord had commanded Moses
